Sentencas: In this paper, a hierarchical model library of natural gas internal reforming (IR) solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) is developed to reflect a multi-level modeling design.
Titulo: A multi-level simulation platform of natural gas internal reforming solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid generation system: Part I. Solid oxide fuel cell model library

Sentencas: First, two types of positive electrolyte negative (PEN) models are presented, which take into account the electromotive force of multi-component fuel and H-2/CO joint electrochemical oxidation.
Titulo: A multi-level simulation platform of natural gas internal reforming solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid generation system: Part I. Solid oxide fuel cell model library

Sentencas: Secondly, an advanced PEN model is introduced for better prediction at high fuel utilization.
Titulo: A multi-level simulation platform of natural gas internal reforming solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid generation system: Part I. Solid oxide fuel cell model library

Sentencas: Thirdly, an approximate analytical PEN model is introduced to achieve a balance between accuracy and speed.
Titulo: A multi-level simulation platform of natural gas internal reforming solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid generation system: Part I. Solid oxide fuel cell model library

Sentencas: Cell-level modeling provides boundary conditions for PEN-level models via a unified description of flow and heat transfer in both planar and tubular geometries.
Titulo: A multi-level simulation platform of natural gas internal reforming solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid generation system: Part I. Solid oxide fuel cell model library

Sentencas: Unlike quasi-equilibrium and lumped cell-level models, distributed modeling reveals a significant difference between outlet gas temperatures and average solid temperature, especially under countercurrent flow.
Titulo: A multi-level simulation platform of natural gas internal reforming solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid generation system: Part I. Solid oxide fuel cell model library

Sentencas: Based on analytical view factors, the detailed radiation heat transfer model shows greater uniform distribution of current density and solid temperature.
Titulo: A multi-level simulation platform of natural gas internal reforming solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid generation system: Part I. Solid oxide fuel cell model library

Sentencas: Upon validation, the multi-level SOFC model library constitutes the main component of the modular simulation platform for IRSOFC-GT (gas turbine) hybrid generation systems in a gPROMS environment.
Titulo: A multi-level simulation platform of natural gas internal reforming solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid generation system: Part I. Solid oxide fuel cell model library
